channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OR

item.title: Report X-2024031035
item.description:
Report X-2024031035

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-27T15:12:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-19
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: TWILIGHT RESPONDER RESPONDED TO A HAZMAT THAT HAD A STAIN THAT WAS SHOWING. THE RESPONDER PUT ON THE PROPER PPE AND USED HIS DECISION TREE TO BRING THE PACKAGE BACK TO THE PSC TO PROCESS. TWILIGHT RESPONDER DID A LEAK TEST ON THE CONTAINER, NOTICED THAT IT WAS NO LONGER LEAKING AND PUT LIQUID IN CONTAINER INTO GREEN DMP BAG, AND ALSO MADE A SEPERATE DMP BAG FOR THE AFFECTED CARDBOARD.

item.title: Report X-2024030841
item.description:
Report X-2024030841

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-26T15:10:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-12
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered leaking. It was removed from sortation and brought to QA. DescribePack: Cap was loose. No hazardous markings on box. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed upright in a lined spill bin and brought to the appropriate processing area.

item.title: Report X-2024030954
item.description:
Report X-2024030954

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-25T15:12:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-17
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered by manager in unload. QA was notified and admin began cleanup before taking package to Hazmat Cage for processing. DescribePack: Bottom of plastic drum was split across the middle allowing granulated chemical to spill. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Gloves, respirator, and hand brush used to sweep up spilled granules which were placed on lined hazmat tote with damaged package and immediately taken to hazmat cage for processing.

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: pressure washer was not emptied completely of gas during transit some gas leaked out. found in damages repack area moved to hazmat cage DescribePack: pressure washer was not emptied completely of gas during transit some gas leaked out DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: found in damages repack area moved to hazmat cage

item.title: Report X-2024030692
item.description:
Report X-2024030692

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-22T18:13:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-01
  • City: BEND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was brought to QA due to strong odor. I then identified the hazardous materials by referring to the hazmat paperwork. I put on appropriate PPE to handle package and dispose of according to fedex policy. DescribePack: The package was loosely taped with water activated paper tape and the fiber board box had slight crush wrinkles on box. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Wearing the proper PPE I was able to pour the escaped amount in box into hazmat drum along with the plastic bucket containing spilling contents.

item.title: Report X-2024030727
item.description:
Report X-2024030727

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-22T18:13:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-08
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: item given to QA for inspection as outer box is wet found to be 4 jugs of Hand-E-San one of which has small hole in the bottom causing it to leak DescribePack: the bottom of one of the jugs has small hole in seal that is causing it to leak no damage is found on outer package DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: item was placed in hazmat bin and all paper work was filed
